mapper.sql: id ,inspection_cycle,type_id, name,device_id,place, status,scrap,amount, barcode,inspection,install_time, expiry_time,company_id,factory_date, warranty,create_time
mapper.select: SELECT message.id, message.inspection_cycle, type.`name` AS type_name, message.`name`, message.device_id, message.place, message.`status`, message.scrap, message.amount, message.barcode, message.inspection, message.install_time, message.expiry_time, company.`name` AS company_name, message.factory_date, message.warranty, message.create_time FROM device_message AS message LEFT JOIN device_type AS type ON message.type_id = type.id LEFT JOIN device_company AS company ON company.id = message.company_id ORDER BY message.create_time DESC

SELECT message.id, message.inspection_cycle, type.`name` AS type_name, message.`name`, message.device_id, message.place, message.`status`, message.scrap, message.amount, message.barcode, message.inspection, message.install_time, message.expiry_time, company.`name` AS company_name, message.factory_date, message.warranty, message.create_time FROM device_message AS message LEFT JOIN device_type AS type ON message.type_id = type.id LEFT JOIN device_company AS company ON company.id = message.company_id WHERE message.`name` = #{name} ORDER BY message.create_time DESC
